titles.title: Search me, O my Lord, and cleanse me from my sin,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Search me, O my Lord, and cleanse me from my sin,
Wash me thoroughly, from my iniquity
And I shall be whiter than the snow.
Where thou leadest me, Lord, will I go.
I want to soar in the heavenlies,
Desire Your truth to be worked in me
Until the day You're revealed in me,
Until the day You're revealed in me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Refiner's fire must come to burn away the dross
Until the day is here of the revealing of His sons.
And on that day Jehovah shall say,
"I do delight in your sacrifice.
I take pleasure in those who have won,
Did not shrink back when they heard of the price"
And on that day I will rule with Him,
And on that day I will rule with Him.
